apple.description: An apple that has a worm in it...eww
apple.eat: You take a bite of the apple, you feel the rotting pieces of fruit slide down your throat. You feel a bit sick.
apple.examine: Upon closer examination, the apple is rotting. This is disgusting, I suggest you don't eat it.
apple.name: apple

dagger.examine: This dagger needs to be sharpened.
dagger.name: dagger
